trans-unit.source: Defines the optional contract that a binding can implement to specify whether incoming requests are handled synchronously or asynchronously by the service.
trans-unit.target: Definerer valgfrie kontrakten som en binding kan implementere for å angi om innkommende forespørsler håndteres synkron eller asynkron av tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: In some cases it may be more efficient for a binding to process messages with the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: I noen tilfeller kan det være mer effektivt for en binding til å behandle meldinger med den synkron <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>eller <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>metoder.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding> class can optionally implement IBindingRuntimePreferences to indicate to callers that this is preferred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>klasse kan eventuelt implementere IBindingRuntimePreferences for å angi til brukere at dette er ønsket.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding>

trans-unit.source: If a binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer defaults to using the asynchronous versions of the `Receive` and `Request` methods.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en binding ikke implementerer IBindingRuntimePreferences, den [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service modellen Runtime laget som standard bruker asynkrone versjoner av den `Receive` og `Request` metoder.

trans-unit.source: If a binding does implement IBindingRuntimePreferences, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service Model Runtime layer checks the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> and uses that to determine whether to call the synchronous versions of the these methods (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) or the asynchronous versions (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en binding implementerer IBindingRuntimePreferences, den [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Service modellen Runtime laget kontrollerer verdien for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>og bruker som til å bestemme om å kalle synkron versjonene av disse metodene (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> eller <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>) eller asynkrone versjoner (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>eller <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IBindingRuntimePreferences is implemented by the binding and returns `true` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the synchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> methods to receive messages from the channel.
trans-unit.target: Hvis IBindingRuntimePreferences er implementert av denne bindingen, og returnerer `true` fra den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>egenskapen det anbefales at du bruker den synkron <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A>metoder for å motta meldinger fra kanalen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.Request%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.Receive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the binding does not implement IBindingRuntimePreferences or returns `false` from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, it is recommended that you use the asynchronous <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> methods.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bindingen ikke implementerer IBindingRuntimePreferences eller returnerer `false` fra den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>egenskapen det anbefales at du bruker den asynkrone <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29>eller <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29>metoder.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.EndRequest%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel.BeginRequest%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.EndReceive%28System.IAsyncResult%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel.BeginReceive%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value returned by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A> property, all bindings must still provide valid implementations of both the synchronous and asynchronous versions of the `Receive` methods for the specific channel types implemented.
trans-unit.target: Uavhengig av verdien som returneres av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>egenskapen alle bindinger må fremdeles Oppgi gyldig implementeringer av både synkrone og asynkrone versjonene av `Receive` metoder for bestemt kanaltyper implementert.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IBindingRuntimePreferences.ReceiveSynchronously%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about implementing custom channels, see [Developing Channels](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om implementering av egendefinerte kanaler [utvikling kanaler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether incoming requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously or asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om innkommende forespørsler kan behandles mer effektivt synkron eller asynkron.

trans-unit.source: The standard (system-provided) bindings provided by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] have implemented this interface and in some cases override the default value to process incoming messages synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Standard (forutsatt system) bindingene fra [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] har implementert dette grensesnittet og i enkelte tilfeller overstyre standardverdien for å behandle innkommende meldinger synkront.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if requests can be handled more efficiently synchronously; otherwise<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis forespørsler kan behandles mer effektivt synkront; Ellers<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, to handle requests asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, for å behandle forespørsler asynkront.
